author: hermanns
msg: UI Tag Shortcuts (key shortcut in place of name, value, and label)

author: hogstrom
msg: Updated the code to allow for the specification of a <select-for-update> element in openejb-jar.xsd so that
users deploying CMP 2.x entity beans can specify the access intent for EJBs.  The access intent tells TranQL how
to generate the SQL for various databases to obtain an appropriate database lock.  For Oracle a simple FOR UPDATE
clause is appended to the SELECT statements.  For DB2 the predicate FOR UPDATE WITH RS KEEP AND USE UPDATE LOCKS is
added.  DB2 is different that Oracle in that it allows for multiple Isolation levels during a transaction and each
Isolation level has different Lock semantics.
This fix enhancement requires TranQL 1.4-SNAPSHOT as of 2006/11/13 at 1800 ET.
